head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MARESCA, HON. OREST V.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MARESCA, HON. OREST V.

block.p: MARESCA-Hon. Orest V., on October 6, 2000. Beloved son of the late Vincentina and Michael. Dear friend of Mario Puppio, Charles Marin and Carmine De Sapio. Also survived by other relatives and many friends. Friends may call at Andrett Funeral Home, 353 Second Ave. (at 20th St.), NYC, Mon. 2-5PM and 7-9PM. Mass of Christian burial at Church of the Epiphany (at 22nd St. and Second Ave.) Tues., 10AM. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery.
MARESCA-Honorable Orest (Augie). Goodbye, old friend of more than 50 years. Ruth and I will miss you, your wise counsel and political advice. Dr. Arthur and Ruth Marks
